text.__SUMMARY__: Pandanus montanus ("Baquois redresse") is a species of monocots in the genus Pandanus, endemic to Réunion in wet forest and swamp at an elevation of 400–1700 meters.
text.Description: It is a small, slender tree of 3–5 m in height. Its fruit-head is initially held up erectly, but droops down and becomes dark red when ripe. Each fruit head is packed with red, dome-shaped drupes.
text.Synonyms:
Pandanus borbonicus Huynh
Pandanus erigens Thouars
Pandanus gaudichaudii Martelli
Sussea conoidea Gaudich.
Sussea microcarpa Gaudich.
text.References: Cirad (Centre de coopération internationale en recherche agronomique pour le développement) entry
